title: As a Zed main, I think we should nerf Zed
body:
I mean wow, all he does his spam his OP WQ and after a while, he presses R, kills me then tps back to safety WOW SO BS I CAN'T BELIEVE I'M ABUSING HIM RIGHT NOW.

Like, the last nerf did nothing to him. Now, all he can do to counter that 1 second without teleporting back is TO WAIT 1 SECOND, THAT'S BULLSHIT, WHY IS THIS SO EASY TO COUNTER OMG 

Seriously, you should make his ultimate wait 0.5 seconds instead of 1, so he won't be able to counter the spell by waiting 1 second anymore, thus giving his opponents more room for counterplay.

Also, his W AD scaling is way too high, make it scale with Attack Speed, so he will be punished for buying AP instead of Critical Chance.
